errors.invalid-credentials: Thông tin đăng nhập không hợp lệ
errors.admin-already-exists: Người dùng với quyền quản trị đã tồn tại. Vui lòng đăng nhập để tạo người dùng mới từ Trang quản trị.
errors.invalid-username: Tên người dùng không hợp lệ
errors.error-creating-user: Đã có lỗi khi tạo người dùng
errors.no-change-password-request: Không có yêu cầu thay đổi mật khẩu nào được tìm thấy
errors.not-allowed-in-demo: Không được phép trong chế độ DEMO
errors.not-allowed-in-dev: Không được phép trong chế độ DEV
errors.invalid-password-length: Mật khẩu phải dài ít nhất 8 ký tự
errors.totp-not-enabled: 2FA is not enabled for this user
errors.totp-already-enabled: 2FA đã được kích hoạt cho người dùng này
errors.app-failed-to-start: Failed to start app {id}, see logs for more details
errors.app-failed-to-install: Failed to install app {id}, see logs for more details
errors.app-failed-to-stop: Failed to stop app {id}, see logs for more details
errors.app-failed-to-uninstall: Failed to uninstall app {id}, see logs for more details
errors.app-failed-to-update: Failed to update app {id}, see logs for more details
errors.domain-required-if-expose-app: Domain is required if app is exposed
errors.domain-not-valid: Domain {domain} is not a valid domain
errors.invalid-config: App {id} has an invalid config.json file
errors.app-force-exposed: App {id} works only with exposed domain
errors.domain-already-in-use: Domain {domain} is already in use by app {id}
errors.current-version-is-latest: Current version is already up to date
errors.major-version-update: The major version has changed. Please update manually (instructions on GitHub)

totp.title: Two-factor authentication
totp.instructions: Enter the code from your authenticator app

reset-password.title: Reset your password
reset-password.instructions: Run this command on your server and then refresh this page
reset-password.success: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password. And your email {email}

password.minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters

password-confirmation.minlength: Password confirmation must be at least 8 characters

my-apps.title: My Apps
my-apps.empty-subtitle: Install an app from the app store to get started

app-details.update-config-success: App config updated successfully. Restart the app to apply the changes
app-details.author: Author

install-form.title: Install {name}
install-form.domain-name-hint: Make sure this exact domain contains an A record pointing to your IP.

errors.invalid-email: {label} must be a valid email address
errors.ip: {label} must be a valid IP address
errors.fqdnip: {label} must be a valid domain or IP address

uninstall-form.title: Uninstall {name} ?
uninstall-form.subtitle: All data for this app will be lost.
uninstall-form.warning: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

update-form.title: Update {name} ?
update-form.subtitle2: This will reset your custom configuration (e.g. changes in docker-compose.yml)

actions.title: Actions
actions.stay-up-to-date: Stay up to date with the latest version of Tipi
actions.new-version: A new version ({version}) of Tipi is available
actions.maintenance-subtitle: Common actions to perform on your instance

settings.title: General settings
settings.subtitle: This will update your settings.json file. Make sure you know what you are doing before updating these values.
settings.settings-updated: Settings updated. Restart your instance to apply new settings.
settings.domain-name-hint: Make sure this exact domain contains an A record pointing to your IP.
settings.internal-ip-hint: IP address your server is listening on.
settings.storage-path-hint: Path to the storage directory. Keep empty for default (runtipi/app-data). Make sure it is an absolute path and that it exists
settings.local-domain-hint: Domain name used for accessing apps in your local network. Your apps will be accessible at app-name.local-domain.

security.change-password-subtitle: Changing your password will log you out of all devices.
security.2fa-subtitle: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an additional layer of security to your account.
security.2fa-subtitle-2: When enabled, you will be prompted to enter a code from your authenticator app when you log in.
security.scan-qr-code: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app.
security.enter-2fa-code: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
security.password-needed-hint: Your password is required to change two-factor authentication settings.

form.password-length: Password must be at least 8 characters
